title: Waste Segregation Guidelines Updated
author: DENR
description: New guidelines for waste segregation effective from October 1st.
content: {"time":1725028690452,"blocks":[{"id":"block1","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We have updated the waste segregation guidelines to enhance recycling efforts."}},{"id":"block2","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Please follow the updated guidelines to ensure proper waste disposal."}},{"id":"block3","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For details, visit the updated guidelines on our website."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: New Recycling Program Launch
author: City Council
description: Introducing a new recycling program starting next month.
content: {"time":1725028690453,"blocks":[{"id":"block4","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"A new recycling program will be launched on October 15th."}},{"id":"block5","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The program aims to improve recycling rates in Cavite City."}},{"id":"block6","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"More information will be available on our website soon."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Monthly Waste Collection Schedule
author: Waste Management Team
description: Check out the updated waste collection schedule for this month.
content: {"time":1725028690454,"blocks":[{"id":"block7","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"The waste collection schedule has been updated for this month."}},{"id":"block8","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Make sure to check your collection day on our website."}},{"id":"block9","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Please adhere to the schedule to ensure timely collection."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Upcoming Environmental Seminar
author: Green City Initiative
description: Join our seminar to learn more about environmental conservation.
content: {"time":1725028690455,"blocks":[{"id":"block10","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"An environmental seminar will be held on October 20th."}},{"id":"block11","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Learn about effective conservation practices and waste management."}},{"id":"block12","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Register on our website to attend the seminar."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: New Waste Reduction Tips
author: Waste Management Expert
description: Check out our latest tips for reducing waste at home.
content: {"time":1725028690456,"blocks":[{"id":"block13","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We have compiled new tips for reducing waste at home."}},{"id":"block14","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Implement these tips to contribute to waste reduction."}},{"id":"block15","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Visit our website for the full list of tips."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Community Recycling Drive
author: Local NGOs
description: Participate in our community recycling drive this weekend.
content: {"time":1725028690457,"blocks":[{"id":"block16","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"A community recycling drive will take place on September 7th."}},{"id":"block17","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Drop off your recyclable materials at the designated locations."}},{"id":"block18","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For more details, check our website."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Waste Management Workshop
author: Environmental Group
description: Attend our workshop to learn more about effective waste management practices.
content: {"time":1725028690458,"blocks":[{"id":"block19","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"A waste management workshop will be held on October 5th."}},{"id":"block20","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Learn best practices for managing waste at home."}},{"id":"block21","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Register on our website to secure your spot."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Sustainable Living Tips
author: Eco Friendly Team
description: Explore our new tips for living sustainably.
content: {"time":1725028690459,"blocks":[{"id":"block22","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Discover new tips for sustainable living."}},{"id":"block23","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Implement these tips to reduce your environmental footprint."}},{"id":"block24","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Visit our website for the complete guide."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Zero Waste Challenge
author: Green Initiatives
description: Participate in our zero waste challenge starting next month.
content: {"time":1725028690460,"blocks":[{"id":"block25","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"We are launching a zero waste challenge on October 1st."}},{"id":"block26","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Join us in reducing waste and living sustainably."}},{"id":"block27","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Sign up on our website to participate."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}

title: Recycling Bin Distribution
author: City Council
description: New recycling bins will be distributed to households next week.
content: {"time":1725028690461,"blocks":[{"id":"block28","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Recycling bins will be distributed starting September 15th."}},{"id":"block29","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"Ensure to place your recyclables in the new bins."}},{"id":"block30","type":"paragraph","data":{"text":"For more information, visit our website."}}],"version":"2.30.5"}
